aboutComponent.text: Dektol hotel is the most peffered hotel in West Africa. It is located in the heart of victoria island. Dektol Hotel is just a 10-minute drive to the City Center and ony 45minutes away from the airport. Our hotel is designed for your comfort and convinence. Your security is our primary concern and you will find our customer care second to none. Our hotel has taken important steps to live up West Africa's future model in the hospitality sector, With the best Conference and Banqueting facilities, tastefully funished to 7000-seater capacity, a world-class swimming pool, with 824 Excellently funished rooms. The hotel is equipped with a state of art health and fitness comprising of a gym, a tennis/basket ball court and a Volly ball court. we have an in-house medical clinic as well. We host best themed buffet every friday were we serve specialities across the globe
aboutComponent.text2: We are passionate about serving you and looking forward to having you.
aboutComponent.mission1: we aspire to be the leading and preffered hotel in west Africa.
aboutComponent.mission2: We are commited to exceeding guest's expectations
aboutComponent.mission3: We are care to deliver genuine care, cormfort and warmth to all our guests.
aboutComponent.mission4: We are constantly adapting to an ever-changing world.

eventComponent.title: Grand ball Event Center
eventComponent.text: For your banqueting needs, our Grand Ball Event Center which sits up to 300 people for dinner is ideal and comes equipped with visual and audio equipment.

eventComponent.title: Dektol Convention Center
eventComponent.text: The Dektol Convention Center is the largest multipurpose conference; banquet and exhibition center in Nigeria, with maximum floor space of 5,151 square metres.

eventComponent.title: Meeting Room
eventComponent.text: At Dektol Hotel, we can accommodate meetings of up to 2,500 people and provide all the necessary assistance in terms of your technology requirements.
